titleStmt.title: Epipapresbyter, grand-child to Smectymnuus, or, The worlds huy and cry after Titus Oates ordain'd doctor of Devility at Salamanca ...

notesStmt.note: Smectymnuus is a word composed of the initials of the authors, viz. Stephen Marshall, Edmund Calamy, Thomas Young, Matthew Newcomen, and William Spurstowe. Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library.
